title: velkoz has 2 classic skins
body: So I wanted to try out that sexy new velkoz skin and realized velkoz has 2 classic skins atm.

replies.body: It was bound to happen as he studied Nami...

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Wo3aAHQi,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-28T21:46:34.983+0000)
>
> Thanks for the report!

Nami does as well. I don't have a screenshot but she does.
Man this has been a bug on him since he came out, for me at least.
one for each eye of course{{champion:161}} {{champion:161}}
Oh, I didn't realize other people saw this too.
this is annoying. i only had 3 champions: Vegar, Malphite and Vel'koz and my chrismas gift is the champion velkoz. i had 2 classic skins
Looks like its still not fixed
He is just so classy that he needs 2 classic skins.

It's happening again guys. Rolled him in aram and found 2 classic skins.

http://puu.sh/gbl41/336e8979f1.jpg
Lol I got that too. Looked it up on Google and found this post from 3 hours ago.
